siteDescription: Independent VanMoof repair specialist. S3 & X3 repairs, error codes, battery problems. 500+ bikes repaired. 98% success rate.
heroSubtitle: The independent specialist for VanMoof S3 and X3. Where official support ends, we begin.
explorerSubtitle: Discover which problems we solve. Click on a VanMoof component for more information.
explorerSelectHint: Click on one of the golden points on the bike to learn more about potential problems and repairs.
explorerClickForDetails: Click on a component for details
componentBatteryDescription: The battery is the heart of your VanMoof. Battery problems can prevent your bike from starting or reduce range. We diagnose and repair battery issues quickly and professionally.
componentMotorDescription: The hub motor provides electric assistance. Problems can range from no assistance to strange noises. We repair or replace your motor.
componentDisplayDescription: The iconic matrix display shows speed, battery status and more. Problems can cause the display to not light up or show incorrect information.
componentSensorDescription: The sensors measure your pedaling motion and determine how much assistance you get. Defective sensors can lead to no or too much assistance.
componentControllerDescription: The controller is the brain of your VanMoof. It controls all electrical components. Problems can cause various error codes.
configuratorSubtitle: Select your model and problem for an instant price indication.
servicesRepairDescription: From battery to motor, from display to sensor. We repair all parts of your VanMoof with professional equipment and original parts.
servicesTransferDescription: Bought or sold a VanMoof? We help with the digital transfer and linking to your account.
servicesDiagnoseDescription: Full analysis of your VanMoof with professional diagnostic equipment.
servicesReadyDescription: We make your VanMoof completely road-ready with inspection of all parts.
servicesSoftwareDescription: Software updates, resets and linking to your account.
servicesNotSure: Not sure which service you need?
ctaSubtitle: Contact a specialist directly. Average response time within 24 hours.
contactSubtitle: Have a question or want to make an appointment? We're here to help.
contactFormNameError: Name must be at least 2 characters
contactFormPhoneError: Please enter a valid phone number
contactFormSuccess: Message sent! We'll contact you as soon as possible.
contactFormError: Something went wrong. Please try again or call us directly.
footerDescription: Independent VanMoof specialist. Reliable repairs where official support falls short.
